member.name: IActiveDesktop.AddDesktopItem
member.summary: Adds a desktop item.
member.param: A pointer to the structure that specifies the item to be added.
Reserved. Must be set to zero.

returns.para: Returns one of the following values.

listheader.description: Failed to add the desktop item, or an instance of the desktop item already exists on the Active Desktop.
One or more of the parameters were invalid.
Desktop item has been added successfully.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.AddDesktopItemWithUI
member.summary: Adds a desktop item to the Active Desktop after displaying user interfaces that confirm the addition of the desktop item, verifying security zone permissions, and asking if the user wants to create a subscription.
member.param: The handle of the parent window. If NULL, the desktop item is added without displaying any user interface, in accordance with the corresponding security zone permissions. For more information, see About URL Security Zones.
Address of the structure containing the details of the desktop item to be added.

param.name: dwReserved
param.para: Unsigned long integer value that contains the flags that control how the desktop item is added. Can be one of the following values.
Do default action. Identical to using zero.
Activate the subscription wizard to allow the user to subscribe to this desktop item.
Instruct the system to look at the structure passed to the cpPos member of the structure to ensure that the values are within reasonable limits. This value was added for Internet Explorer 5.

returns.para: Returns one of the following values.

listheader.description: Failed to add the desktop item, or an instance of the desktop item already exists on the Active Desktop.
One or more of the parameters were invalid.
If the ADDURL_SILENT flag has been set, the desktop item has either been added successfully or it already exists on the Active Desktop. Otherwise, the desktop item has been added successfully.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.AddUrl
member.summary: Adds the desktop item associated with the specified URL.
member.param: A handle to the parent window for the user interface.
A pointer to a string that contains the URL of the desktop item.
A pointer to the structure that contains the details of the desktop item to be added.
An unsigned long integer value that controls this method. Can be set to ADDURL_SILENT to add a desktop item without displaying any user interfaces.

returns.para: Returns one of the following values.

listheader.description: Failed to add the desktop item or an instance of the desktop item already exists on the Active Desktop.
One or more of the parameters were invalid.
If the ADDURL_SILENT flag has been set, the desktop item has either been added successfully or it already exists on the Active Desktop. Otherwise, the desktop item has been added successfully.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.ApplyChanges
member.summary: Applies changes to the Active Desktop and saves them in the registry.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: An unsigned long integer value that contains the changes to be applied. Can be one of the following values.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.GenerateDesktopItemHtml
member.summary: Generates a generic HTML page containing the given desktop item.
member.param: A string value that contains the name under which to store the HTML file.
A pointer to the structure of the desktop item to insert in the HTML page.
Reserved. Must be set to zero.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.GetDesktopItem
member.summary: Gets the specified desktop item.
member.param: An unsigned long integer value that contains the desktop item's index. The index values start at zero. Use to retrieve a count on the total number of desktop items.
The address of the structure of the retrieved desktop item.
Reserved. Must be set to zero.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.GetDesktopItemByID
member.summary: Gets the desktop item that matches the given identification.
member.param: An unsigned long integer value that contains the desktop item's identification.
The address of the structure of the retrieved desktop item.
Reserved. Must be set to zero.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.GetDesktopItemBySource
member.summary: Gets a desktop item using its source URL.
member.param: A pointer to a string that contains the source URL of the desktop item.
A pointer to the structure that, when this method returns successfully, receives the details about the desktop item. On entry, the size of the structure must be set.
Reserved. Must be set to zero.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.GetDesktopItemCount
member.summary: Gets a count of the desktop items.
member.param: A pointer to an int value that, when this method returns successfully, contains the count.
Reserved. Must be set to zero.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.GetDesktopItemOptions
member.summary: Gets the options for the desktop item.
member.param: The address of the structure containing the options that are currently set.
Reserved. Must be set to zero.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.GetPattern
member.summary: Gets the current pattern.
member.param: A pointer to a null-terminated, Unicode buffer containing a string of decimals whose bit pattern represents a picture. Each decimal represents the on/off state of the 8 pixels in that row.
The size of the pwszPattern string, in characters.
Reserved. Must be set to zero.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.GetWallpaper
member.summary: Gets the current wallpaper.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a null-terminated, Unicode buffer that contains the file name of the wallpaper.
The size of the pwszWallpaper string, in characters.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: The type of wallpaper to get. One of the following values.
Get the type of wallpaper that was last applied.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.GetWallpaperOptions
member.summary: Gets the wallpaper options.
member.param: The address of a structure containing the options currently set.
Reserved. Must be set to zero.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.ModifyDesktopItem
member.summary: Modifies the desktop item.
member.param: The address of the structure that contains the modifications. The desktop item associated with the wszSource member of the structure will be modified.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: An unsigned long integer value containing the flags used for the modification. This can be one of the following values.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.RemoveDesktopItem
member.summary: Removes the specified desktop item from the desktop.
member.param: The address of the structure that specifies the item to be removed. The desktop item associated with the wszSource member of the structure will be removed.
Reserved. Must be set to zero.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.SetDesktopItemOptions
member.summary: Sets the item's options.
member.param: The address of the structure that contains the options to set.
Reserved. Must be set to zero.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.SetPattern
member.summary: Sets the Active Desktop pattern.
member.param: The address of a string value that contains a string of decimals whose bit pattern represents a picture. Each decimal represents the on/off state of the 8 pixels in that row.
Reserved. Must be set to zero.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.SetWallpaper
member.summary: Sets the wallpaper for the Active Desktop.
member.param: A string value containing the file name of the wallpaper to be set.
Reserved. Must be set to zero.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop.SetWallpaperOptions
member.summary: Sets the wallpaper options.
member.param: The address of the structure containing the options to be set.
Reserved. Must be set to zero.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActiveDesktop
member.summary: Allows a client program to manage the desktop items and wallpaper on a local computer.
